members.name: Financial Data Analyst
members.role: Analyze financial statements and extract relevant data
members.specialization: Financial statement analysis and accounting standards

members.name: Legal Compliance Specialist
members.specialization: International tax law and regulatory compliance

members.name: Risk Assessment Specialist
members.specialization: Tax risk assessment and mitigation strategies

agents.name: tax_modeler
agents.role: Tax simulation builder based on ETR and Top-Up
agents.goal: Building advanced models for calculating ETR and Top-Up Tax

agents.name: legal_interpreter
agents.goal: Legal interpretation of OECD Pillar Two rules

agents.name: xml_reporter
agents.role: GIR report generator according to XML Schema
agents.goal: Creating valid GIR reports according to OECD XML Schema

agents.name: risk_analyst
agents.goal: Comprehensive risk analysis and mitigation strategies

agents.name: transfer_pricing_specialist
agents.goal: Comprehensive transfer pricing analysis for Pillar Two compliance

tools.name: ETR_Calculator
tools.description: Calculate Effective Tax Rate (ETR) based on financial data

tools.name: Tax_Adjustment_Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze and categorize tax adjustments for Pillar Two compliance

tools.name: SBIE_Calculator
tools.description: Calculate Substance-based income exclusion (SBIE) for qualifying activities

tools.name: QDMTT_Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze Qualified Domestic Minimum Top-up Tax (QDMTT) implications

tools.name: Safe_Harbour_Checker
tools.description: Check if company qualifies for Safe Harbours under Pillar Two rules

tools.name: Regulatory_Compliance_Checker
tools.description: Check regulatory compliance with Pillar Two requirements across jurisdictions

tools.name: Compliance_Monitor
tools.description: Monitor and track compliance status across jurisdictions

tools.name: GIR_XML_Generator
tools.description: Generate Global Information Return (GIR) XML files according to OECD schema

tools.name: Country_By_Country_Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze country-by-country reporting data for Pillar Two implications

tools.name: Risk_Assessor
tools.description: Assess comprehensive Pillar Two compliance risks and exposure

tools.name: Mitigation_Planner
tools.description: Plan and recommend risk mitigation strategies

tools.name: Transfer_Pricing_Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze transfer pricing structures and arm's length compliance

tools.name: OECD_Guidelines_Parser
tools.description: Parse and interpret OECD Transfer Pricing Guidelines

tools.name: Jurisdiction_Risk_Scanner
tools.description: Scan jurisdictions for transfer pricing and compliance risks

tools.name: Tax_Treaty_Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze impact of tax treaties on Pillar Two calculations

tools.name: IIR_UTPR_Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze Income Inclusion Rule (IIR) and Undertaxed Profits Rule (UTPR)
